ClaimParticipant.name: ClaimParticipant
ClaimParticipant.description: A junction object that associates the Claim object with the Account object. This object represents the participants of a claim.

ClaimId.description: The ID of the claim in which this participant has one or more roles.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Auto-generated number for the name of the claim participant record.

Roles.description: The roles that the claim participant can have in the claim.
